review: I bought this so that I could stop plugging my computer into my TV. This works great with Netflix, Pandora, and the other apps. It also allows you to cast your computer screen using chrome. I did have a couple issues with the Netflix app on my phone disconnecting from the Chromecast so I couldn't praise or stop what was playing; but I think an update must have fixed that problem recently. You can also play movies on your computer in a chrome tab, and cast them to your TV. I like this option, but it does require your computer to handle streaming to your TV. One last thing to consider, i also have a surface 1, and it does not connect as easily. You have to download different streaming apps, and the Netflix app does not support Chromecast. In all I really enjoy having this, and it performs exactly the way I wanted.
author: Ben
